rule: The input text provided to the chatbot will always be a string representing a news article.
input: The championship game ends in a surprising upset.
validityText:
The input provided is a single sentence that appears to be a headline rather than a complete news article. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a news article and should represent a complete news article suitable for classification. Since the input does not constitute a full article, it does not comply with the specification.

ERR
